4_1LRrd96P7FiTcsyNXVzPM5jtpQoH1B4gYf.body:
I think versioning is better, than "friend's key" for digital- and physical- security reasons.
But it has defferent purposes. Versioning is for saving information. Friend's key - for continuing working on site. But if the info was not permanently deleted - your friend can still clone the site. 
Also - he could just have your private key (what's the difference?) and restore information from his cache.
